A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is a fantastic return to a galaxy far far away. The pacing drags a little in the middle of the film\, however every single actor delivers a stellar performance\, especially Mark Hammill. The film takes characters in a new and exciting direction whilst still maintaining that Star Wars magic. The entirety of TLJ looks beautiful\, with many jaw dropping battles on ground and in space. I absolutely cannot wait until Episode 9. Ignore the hate\, dismiss the anger\, this is the Star Wars film you're looking for.
